text: Friedrich von Löffelholz (7 March 1953 - 2 October 2017) was a German cyclist. He was born in Nuremberg, Germany. He competed in the team time trial event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Von Löffelholz died on October 2, 2017 at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Nuremberg
title: Friedrich von Löffelholz
